categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Freighter Type H was a medium-sized cargo freighter manufactured by Galarne/Ferges Industries. The craft's unusual design and slightly smoother than usual handling characteristics allowed this small manufacturer to squeeze into the crowded freighter market.
Unarmed and only lightly armored, the Type H was best deployed as part of a defended convoy, as its maximum speed was easily no match for even the most primitive starfighter.
